Welcome to SPAM’s documentation!¶

The Spark Project & Asset Manager is a web application originally developed at Spark Digital Entertainment to help manage the production workflow of a 3d animation or VFX pipeline.

  • Deploying SPAM
    • Requirements
    • Setup MySQL (on the dbserver)

    • Allow Apache to access the dirs it needs
    • Configure apache to serve SPAM
    • Configure orbited to run at startup
    • Start orbited and Apache
